key_talking_points: Penalty on Edmonton's Cody Ceci (EDM) for high-sticking Matthew Tkachuk (FLA). Florida will go to the power play with 19:23 remaining in the first period. The score is 5-4 in favor of Florida.
The hits at the beginning of the period demonstrate the physical play intensifying as both teams battle for control early in this close, high-scoring game.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is close (5-4) and there was a penalty called. Momentum is moderate, so MIXED_COVERAGE is appropriate to cover the penalty and game situation.

high_intensity_events.summary: Penalty on EDM #14 for high-sticking at 0:37 of period 1

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the implications of the upcoming power play for Florida. Discuss how Edmonton needs to adjust their discipline.
